name: Towerio
description:
Issues with text rendering in WebGL, we recommend downloading the Windows build. Grab a block and put it down. Just build your tower. Simple as that.

You can play solo or with friends in split-screen. 

 Enjoy our game!

Controls:

Press the key when a truck is in the green zone. Then put down the block and make sure your tower doesn't topple.

Player 1: Q 

Player 2: R 

Player 3: U 

Player 4: P
